EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Webinar: Friday, Jan. 27 at 12:30pm (1327703492.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Webinar: Friday, Jan. 27 at 12:30pm (1327703492.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Test 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Sandy,
I am so glad you were able to attend the webinar  I hope you found it useful! We will be sending out a formal communication to all the participants but I just wanted to respond to your note below and let you know I will be you contact at MBO moving forward if you have any additional questions.
Thank you! Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
Begin forwarded message: From: Sandra Levy <swlevy2002@yahoo.com> Date: January 26, 2012 12:13:47 PM EST To: Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> Subject: Re: MBO Partners Webinar: Friday, Jan. 27 at 12:30pm Reply-To: Sandra Levy <swlevy2002@yahoo.com> Count me in, Steve! Things have changed for me in the employment front and am seriously contemplating launching my own practice. So this webinar invite could not have come at a better time!
Thanks! -Sandy
From: Steve Arhancet <SArhancet@mbopartners.com> To: swlevy2002@yahoo.com Sent: Thursday, January 26, 2012 11:03 AM Subject: MBO Partners Webinar: Friday, Jan. 27 at 12:30pm
Dear Sandy, Throughout our many years of working with consultants, we've gained a lot of insight and knowledge about how to successfully transition to an independent work lifestyle. I'd like to invite you to join our webinar this Friday as we discuss your readiness for a solo career. Join Aassia Haq, our CMO and Sara Conde, our Consultant Services Advisor as they discuss the top 3 questions to ask yourself before going solo. Title: Are You Ready to Go Solo? The Top 3 Questions to Ask Yourself Date/Time: Friday, 1/27, at 12:30 PM EST So, the question remains, are YOU ready? Join us and find out. Register now for this webinar. Read more about the webinar, our speakers and what you'll learn in our recent blog post. Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe
